Booming high density residential area with many single family master planned communities in the area and magnificent mountain views

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
FIRST AND MAIN TOWN CENTER

CENTRAL: Between North Carefree Circle and South Carefree Circle. Home to Cinemark movie theater, the dancing fountain, and a huge selection of shops and restaurants. Featuring year-round free community events, Encore at First & Main Town apartment complex, the Holiday Inn Express Inn & Suites, and a brand new Residence Inn. Space available for lease in Central section.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Prime Retail Spaces Available at First & Main!

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
.8 AC PAD SITE FOR SALE, LEASE OR BUILD-TO-SUIT

Excellent location near Powers Boulevard and Tutt Boulevard with easy access to First and Main Town Center. Bubba’s 33 is now open, and this American style sports bar and pizza place is packed nightly! Join other national tenants, such as Planet Fitness, HuHot, Big R, Jersey Mike’s, Kumon Learning Centers, Little Caesars Pizza, Super Cuts, Circle K and IHOP. Don’t miss your chance to join this fast-growing shopping plaza in the vibrant Powers shopping corridor.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Excellent Location at Powers & Constitution

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Union Town Center is located at the northwest corner of Union Boulevard and Research Parkway.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Join national credit tenants Safeway, Walgreens, Pizza Hut, Subway, Taco Bell, and more. The space available is in an out building on the eastern side of the property located directly across from Summit Cleaners. This is an in-line unit situated between Pizza Time and ReNew 1-Day Dentures. The center has ample parking and boasts strong household demographics.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Space Available in Union Town Center

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
ONE SPACE AVAILABLE

This neighborhood shopping plaza is located on the corner of Astrozon Boulevard and Chelton Road, both direct routes between South Academy Boulevard and South Powers Boulevard. These two major thoroughfares offer easy access to Colorado Springs Airport to the east and Fort Carson to the south.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Only One Space Available in Chelton Shopping Center

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CITY CENTER RETAIL SPACE FOR LEASE

Busy Power Center located in major shopping corridor on North Academy Boulevard between Galley Road and East Platte Avenue. This city center Power Center has many shops and restaurants, including the Picture Show Theater. Plus Chick-fil-A, Restaurant Depot and Hopebridge Autism Therapy Centers are coming soon! With the Citadel Mall located right across the street from Citadel Crossing, this location has become the premier retail center in the heart of Colorado Springs.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Citadel Crossing is Now Leasing!

Circle K Coming Soon! Redevelopment opportunity at this highly visible location on SWC of Galley Road and N. Academy Boulevard. Citadel Mall and Citadel Crossing are located right across the street with many national and regional retail tenants and restaurants nearby. This busy location has become a dual shopping area in the heart of Colorado Springs. Convenient to public transportation, with easy access to downtown, and walkable amenities.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Redevelopment - Pad Sites on Academy & Galley

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
RETAIL SPACE FOR LEASE ON GROUND FLOOR

Well-located center in the busiest part of central Academy Boulevard at Bijou Street, near the Citadel Mall shopping corridor. The north and south buildings have a total of 25,130 SF of retail space, with 1,200 SF available on the ground level. Offering great street visibility, easy access to downtown, and majestic mountain views.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Academy Tower Plaza Has Ground Level Space Available

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at The Citadel Mall which is bordered by North Academy Boulevard, Galley Road, Chelton Road and East Platte Avenue. Building faces N. Citadel Drive and is adjacent to Dillard’s Clearance Center Store.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Large anchor space with two connected levels. Three public exterior entrances, as well as interior mall access on upper level. Ample parking via easement with The Citadel Mall.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Southeast corner of Interquest & Voyager Parkway

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
PRIME PROPERTY AVAILABLE

153 Acre Mixed-Use Development Prime Property Available! Top national retailers, such as In-N-Out Burger, Ent Federal Credit Union and Penrose-St. Francis Health Services, are building facilities in this rapidly developing area off I-25 on the southeast corner of Interquest & Voyager Parkway. In recent years, this area has emerged as one of the city’s hottest residential and commercial hubs; it’s home to increasing numbers of restaurants, stores, hotels, apartments, townhomes and major employers, among others. Come be a part of the winning attitude at Victory Ridge!

Includes:
153-acre development

1.6 million SF of stores, restaurants and offices

125,000 SF office Class A+ building under construction

15-screen ICON Cinema with 106' mega screen

1,100-space parking garage

221 Townhomes

17.02 Acre Apartments

8 Acre Neighborhood Park

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 153 Acre Mixed-Use Development

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
WELL-KNOWN NORTH ACADEMY TRADE AREA

Centerpointe Plaza is located at the southeastern corner of the intersection of Academy Boulevard and Vickers Drive. The intersection is a well-known North Academy trade area with excellent access and high traffic counts. The center is anchored by Tuesday Morning, Key Bank, Woodley’s Fine Furniture, International Beauty Academy, Subway, Boot Barn and Dollar Tree.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Centerpointe Plaza Is Leasing on North Academy

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
SPACE NOW AVAILABLE FOR LEASE

Cheyenne Montana is an exceptional neighborhood Safeway anchored center in the premier Broadmoor Bluffs neighborhood with majestic mountain views, and situated at the doorstep to Fort Carson. The center has incredible visibility and easy access from Highway 115 and South Academy Boulevard. National co-tenants include Safeway, Papa John’s, Great Clips, AT&T, Wild Wings n’ Things and Postal Annex.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Cheyenne Montana Is Now Leasing!

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
PRIME LOCATION - TWO RESTAURANT SPACES AVAILABLE!

Broadmoor Towne Center only has two more spaces available in prime locations at the main entrance to the shopping center. Both spaces offer sidewalk dining area with high visibility and amazing mountain views. This major shopping center is located at the southeast corner of Southgate Road and East Cheyenne Road, extending down South Nevada Avenue to Lake Avenue. National tenants include Home Depot, Ross, PetsMart, Michael’s, Bed Bath & Beyond, Red Robin, Chipotle, with Ulta and Old Navy now open!



Space Available
2130 Southgate, Suite 106 - 2,400 SF
2130 Southgate, Suite 108 - 1,800 SF (end-cap unit)

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
SPACE AVAILABLE IN GRANDVIEW MARKETPLACE!

Grandview Marketplace is located in the city of Colorado Springs, at the highly visible northwest corner of Centennial Boulevard and Fillmore Street. The center, built in 2004, offers a great tenant mix and is anchored by King Soopers. It is located near the new VA hospital with convenient access to I-25 and Garden of the Gods Road.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Former Sandwich Shop Space Available in Grandview Marketplace!

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: This 2,644 square foot freestanding building is situated at the junction of W. Colorado Avenue at 8th Street, just before the gateway into historic Old Colorado City, one of the premier destinations for unique shopping and dining on W. Colorado Ave.

Or, head south on 8th Street into the westside’s major shopping corridor between Hwy 24 and Motor City Drive featuring major retailers such as Walmart Supercenter, Hobby Lobby, Texas Roadhouse and McDonalds.
This location also offers easy access to downtown, I-25, and western routes into the mountains, which will ensure this property will go fast!

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This is a great owner/user building and Tenant will vacate at time of sale. The property has its own parking lot, making it convenient to the steady stream of locals and tourists alike.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: ICONIC PROPERTY JUST BEFORE THE GATEWAY INTO OLD COLORADO CITY

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on the southwest corner of South 8th Street and Costilla Street in the westside’s primary retail corridor.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This multi-tenant strip center is in close proximity to many national retailers including Super Wal-Mart, Office Depot, Hoppy Lobby and McDonald’s. Highly traveled street with excellent visibility, this location offers convenient access to downtown Colorado Springs to the east and mountain communities to the west.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Great Location - Excellent Corner Exposure!
